item.title: Massive crater on A40 just past Tennyson Rd, 14th January
item.description:
A40 as you drive towards town from roundabout, just past Tennyson Rd more or less adjacent to bus stop, now creeping in to bus lane also. This has deteriorated even in the last week. Road surface is also breaking down slightly further up before the crossing. Another massive crater has also appeared on the opposite side of the road, causing vehicles to swerve into oncoming traffic to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Campden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of litter, 14th January
item.description:
There is a horrible amount of litter scattered around this junction. Really awful. Please can it be cleaned up and CCTV or at least signs warning about it put up?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
